text: Hi All !! Does form scope in the HubSpot token is available for free accounts? <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/working-with-oauth#:~:text=to><https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/working-with-oauth#:~:text=to%20your%20app.-,Scopes,depends%20on%20HubSpot%20account%20tier| your app.-,Scopes,depends on HubSpot account tier> In this link, mentioned as any account also <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/submit_form_v3_authentication#:~:text=As><https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/submit_form_v3_authentication#:~:text=As%20this%20API%20is%20authenticated%2C| this API is authenticated,> In this link free and starter , mentioned as Free/Starter accounts: 100 requests/10 seconds

I googled for a while with no luck. On with segment support with little luck and then as soon as I posted I found it! Rubber duck!

Hi there,
I have a slightly technical question about HubSpot VOIP. We'd like to integrate the API in order to have the call recordings, but we'd like to have the 2 separate audio tracks and not 1 MP3 file that integrates the 2. We've understood that we have to split the audio file ourselves, but we don't know exactly how to automaticaly associate each audio channel to a person. Thanks

Wow, that project sounds like a never-ending rabbit hole...

Your application receives back a single audio file -> then you split the audio file into two channels one for each voice? (during this step, how does the application know which audio data to separate/mute out for each voice?)

I am thinking a reference for each voice needs to be created prior to the process that splits the audio, so that you could have each channel linked to the reference that was created, associating it to the correct person...

Hello, We are integrating with HubSpot's CMS Blog API.   The documents for v3 seem say its not supported, and can change at any time.  The `@HubSpot/api-client` is already using V3 and v2 is served from legacydocs.   Is there a timeline for  officially switching version support?

Hi There, Just checking if someone can help. I'm not sure if this is the right channel, please let me know, thanking you in advance

HI team,
Our team plan to use the HubSpot API to transfer the data to our solutions. But HubSpot support team told that we need to create a app in the HubSpot marketplace , so that they can approve our solutions. but we facing an issue that verifed domain.
How can i resolve this issue?
